project.name: Dove
project.description: The MMBase Dove application provides an XML interface to MMBase. This interface used to be part of the Editwizards software, but nowadays it is a seperate component. When using Dove, you must implement the XML api yourself. It was created before standards as XML-RPC and SOAP were available. If you need to access the full MMBase Bridge API remotely, you are encouraged to use RMMCI instead.
